name: axure-to-mermaid
description: This script is designed to be used with [Axure RP](https://axure.com) (a phenomenal wireframing tool) prototypes, when it is run it will copy your published sitemap tree as a mermaid flowchart to your clipboard.

scripts.build: npm run build:bundle && npm run build:bundle-min && npm run build:inject && npm run build:inject-min && npm run size-report
